mapper.select: SELECT ssg.*, s.name, s.subjectScore, cs.coreCode, cd.coreDetailName FROM student_subject_grade ssg LEFT JOIN subject s ON ssg.subjectId = s.id LEFT JOIN core_subject cs ON ssg.subjectId = cs.subjectId LEFT JOIN core_detail cd ON cs.coreCode = cd.coreCode WHERE ssg.id=#{userNumber} AND ssg.completeType = '교선' AND cs.coreCode IS NOT NULL;
